com.jjoe64.graphview

Class SecondScale

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jjoe64.graphview.SecondScale

  • public class SecondScale
extends java.lang.Object
    To be used to plot a second scale on the graph. The second scale has always to have manual bounds. Use setMinY(double) and setMaxY(double) to set them. The second scale has it's own array of series.

      add a series to the second scale.
      void calcCompleteRange()
      caches the complete range (minX, maxX, minY, maxY) by iterating all series and all datapoints and stores it into #mCompleteRange for the x-range it will respect the series on the second scale - not for y-values

    • Constructor Detail

      • SecondScale

        SecondScale(GraphView graph)
        creates the second scale. normally you do not call this contructor. Use GraphView.getSecondScale() in order to get the instance.

    • Method Detail

      • addSeries

        public void addSeries(Series s)
        add a series to the second scale. Don't add this series also to the GraphView object.
        Parameters:
        s - the series

      • calcCompleteRange

        public void calcCompleteRange()
        caches the complete range (minX, maxX, minY, maxY) by iterating all series and all datapoints and stores it into #mCompleteRange for the x-range it will respect the series on the second scale - not for y-values

      • drawVerticalAxisTitle

        protected void drawVerticalAxisTitle(android.graphics.Canvas canvas)
        draws the vertical axis title if it is set
        Parameters:
        canvas - canvas
